name: Snowball Battle
description:
This is the first VR game I developed in 4 days for the Holiday VR Jam 2020. To start place level select on the podium in front of you, select a level, then pull the lever. You can press the "secondary button" on either controller (Y or B on Oculus Quest 2) to bring up a menu in the middle of a level if you wish to leave or restart. This game has only been tested on an Oculus Quest 2 so let me know if there are any issues on other devices and I will try to find a fix.

Thank you for checking the project out, I appreciate you. \(~_~\)

Music

Artist: DJ Quads

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/djquads/
